message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $90 for it.
I understand that $120 might be a bit high for you, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell the product to you for $110.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $95 for the product.
I'm willing to make another concession, Bob. I can sell the product to you for $105.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, Alice. I'm willing to pay $98 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can sell the product to you for $102.
I'm willing to meet you at $99, Alice. That's as low as I'm willing to go.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can sell the product to you for $101.
I'm not willing to pay more than $100, Alice. This is my final offer. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product.
